name: Monkeying Around (neverdarkentertainment)
description:
Have you ever wanted to return to monke? Well now with this game Monkeying Around is just another day. Enjoy eating bananas with your monkey friends while you try to break the highscore to be a winner. In this evolution of "Snake" you can play as the monkey using these controls:

1. Up = W

2. Down = S

3. Left = A

4. Right = D

Enjoy a roaring and howling good time with "Monkeying Around" 

Any feedback or any issues that you may hit please leave in the comment before or you can send me a message at jmorhaime@gmail.com
